channel.title: Rune-Mind
channel.description:
Well, Rune-Mind is going to completely restart over now that I've figured out how to fix the combat system on Devolution 7.0. Why have I chosen Devolution V7.0? Devolution V7.0 is pretty well coded and pretty much lag free. The only way I can possibly lag it up if I add to many unnecessary codes and and commands. I am planning on making this a skilling and PKing server. [u][b]Goals for this Week:[/b][/u] [S]- Fix up the Combat System.[/S] [S]- Work on fixing mining.[/S] - Work on woodcutting [S]- Fix up the emote tab[/S] - Make it so you can only connect using Client. - Clean up all codes to make them Tidier. [u][b]What Do I Plan To Do Next Week?:[/b][/u] - Make my own Agility. - Make my own Herbelore. - Hopefully get to Slayer. [u][b]Update Blog:[/b][/u]
[u][b]Week 1:[/b][/u] March 21: I have currently Downloaded [url=http://uppit.com/S9NFC6]Devolution V7.0[/url] I am currently working on fixing up the combat system. The fault that is in the current combat system is that the weapon timers are all off and the weapon hits non-stop. I should have that fixed by the end of the day. The emotes in the emote tab on devolution were all messed up so I quickly fixed that up and I also added a character design interface upon login. Another thing is that when you die, you drop and lose all your items. Mining has also been fixed. Before, you could only mine in a specific area, now you can mine anywhere. March 22: Started to work on agility and now have gnome agility course fixed, Will be starting on barbarian agility course Monday. Aiming for all agility courses to be finished by Wednesday. Also added that NPC's face you in combat tutorial but it apparently doesn't work :S Gonna fix that hopefully on Monday.
[u][b]Pictures[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2lsblgj.jpg[/img] [B]Dialogue:[/B] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/5pq44.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/15ix6e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/11ahcoj.jpg[/img] [B]Ignore the line 2 thing...:[/B] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ev9w89.jpg[/img] [u][b]The Size:[/b][/u] In order to keep you all informed about the size of the server, I will update the size daily. I will have a [b]start[/b], [b]current[/b], [b]end[/b]. [u][b]Start:[/b][/u] [i]2.31 mb[/i] [u][b]Current:[/b][/u] [i]2.30 mb[/i] [u][b]Ending:[/b][/u] [i]Does it look like I'm done?[/i] [u][b]Current Features(That I've added):[/b][/u] - When you die, you drop your items - Mining Fix - Combat Fixed - Added a changing character look interface upon login - Also added a starter.(haven't checked if it works as I haven't even logged into the server.) - Added switch statements for food - Added a range fix(By killamess) - Added NPC Facing Player in Combat(Won't work though :'() [u][b]Working on:[/b][/u] - Agility [B][U]Credits:[/U][/B] [ul]ballin[/ul] [ul]Killamess(For the Base.)[/ul] [ul]Rog3r for the fixes.[/ul] Want to Help Support Us? Put this in your signature area on other forums if you do! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/wlrdyp.jpg[/img] [code][url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,355207.0.html][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/wlrdyp.jpg[/IMG][/url][/code] [B][U]All Flaming will be reported to a moderator. Please post Feedback and Suggestions!!!!!![/U][/B]

@_ballin_jr wrote:

Well, Rune-Mind is going to completely restart over now that Iâ€™ve figured out how to fix the combat system on Devolution 7.0. Why have I chosen Devolution V7.0? Devolution V7.0 is pretty well coded and pretty much lag free. The only way I can possibly lag it up if I add to many unnecessary codes and and commands. I am planning on making this a skilling and PKing server.

Goals for this Week:
- Fix up the Combat System.
- Work on fixing mining.

  • Work on woodcutting
    - Fix up the emote tab
  • Make it so you can only connect using Client.
  • Clean up all codes to make them Tidier.

What Do I Plan To Do Next Week?:

  • Make my own Agility.
  • Make my own Herbelore.
  • Hopefully get to Slayer.

Update Blog:

[u][b]Week 1:[/b][/u] March 21: I have currently Downloaded [url=http://uppit.com/S9NFC6]Devolution V7.0[/url] I am currently working on fixing up the combat system. The fault that is in the current combat system is that the weapon timers are all off and the weapon hits non-stop. I should have that fixed by the end of the day. The emotes in the emote tab on devolution were all messed up so I quickly fixed that up and I also added a character design interface upon login. Another thing is that when you die, you drop and lose all your items. Mining has also been fixed. Before, you could only mine in a specific area, now you can mine anywhere. March 22: Started to work on agility and now have gnome agility course fixed, Will be starting on barbarian agility course Monday. Aiming for all agility courses to be finished by Wednesday. Also added that NPC's face you in combat tutorial but it apparently doesn't work :S Gonna fix that hopefully on Monday.
